title: Countries with highest ransomware infection rates 2017 to 2018
yAxis: Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware
summary: This statistic shows the top 10 countries worldwide based on uranium consumption in 2017 . In that year , the united states was the largest uranium consumer worldwide , using a total of almost 19000 metric tons of uranium . uranium consumption worldwide uranium is a heavy metal that occurs in many rocks as well as in sea water .
gold: This statistic shows the countries with highest ransomware infection rates from 2017 to 2018 . In the measured period , Thailand had the biggest share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware - 9.57 percent .
